prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon with a dark aura and a striking, ominous appearance.
Imagine a dragon-like creature with a powerful presence and sharp, jagged features.
Design a mythical Pokemon that can manipulate dimensions and has an ethereal design.
Give me a legendary Pokemon that embodies the essence of shadows and light.
Show me a dual-type Pokemon that blends elements of ghost and dragon seamlessly.
Generate a Pokemon with a fearsome look and a majestic, flowing body.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a guardian of the underworld, with intricate details.
